dates.title: Date Ideas
dates.subtitle: 26 date ideas, one for every letter. Find inspiration and surprise your partner.
dates.cta: Found the perfect idea? Invite your partner with a personalized message.

A.title: At-home cooking class
A.description: Make a meal together: sushi, homemade pizza, or pastries. The laughs matter more than the result.

B.title: Beach or sunset walk
B.description: Find a beautiful viewpoint, bring a blanket, and watch the sky together.

C.title: Cinema under the stars
C.description: Set up a white sheet, a projector, some cushions, and popcorn. Your very own private theater.

D.title: Blind tasting date
D.description: Blindfold each other and guess chocolates, cheeses, or wines. Loser does the dishes.

E.title: Escape room
E.description: Test your teamwork by solving puzzles together. Nothing brings a couple closer.

F.title: Fun fair adventure
F.description: Cotton candy, Ferris wheel, and winning stuffed animals. Rediscover your inner child.

G.title: Game night
G.description: Board games, co-op video games, or a card battle. A little friendly competition brings you closer.

H.title: Hotel staycation
H.description: Book a surprise hotel in your own city and play tourist for a night.

I.title: Improv night
I.description: Take an improv class together or make up scenes at home. Guaranteed laughs.

J.title: Japanese garden or botanical stroll
J.description: Wander among the flowers, take in the scents, and snap beautiful photos together.

K.title: Karaoke session
K.description: Rent a private room and sing your favorite songs without holding back. Duets are a must.

L.title: Love letter exchange
L.description: Write each other a letter and read it out loud. Intimate and unforgettable.

M.title: Midnight market stroll
M.description: Explore a night market, sample street food from around the world, and wander hand in hand.

N.title: Night under the stars
N.description: Grab some blankets, find a quiet spot, and stargaze together.

O.title: Origami for two
O.description: Follow tutorials and create cranes, hearts, or paper flowers. Gift each other your creations.

P.title: Picnic in the park
P.description: Pack a basket with your favorite foods, a nice bottle, and find the perfect spot.

Q.title: Quiz about your relationship
Q.description: Test how well you know each other with questions about your tastes, memories, and dreams.

R.title: Random road trip
R.description: Get in the car with no destination. Stop wherever catches your eye. The adventure begins.

S.title: Spa night at home
S.description: Candles, soft music, face masks, massages. Turn your bathroom into a wellness retreat.

T.title: Thrift shopping challenge
T.description: Hit up thrift stores and pick out a complete outfit for each other. Fashion challenge accepted.

U.title: Unplugged live music
U.description: Discover a local artist at a bar or small venue. Live music has a charm all its own.

V.title: Visit a museum
V.description: Pick an exhibit that intrigues you both and discuss your impressions over coffee afterward.

W.title: Weekend phone detox
W.description: Disconnect for 48 hours and focus entirely on each other. A digital detox for two.

X.title: eXtreme new experience
X.description: Skydiving, pottery class, float tank... Pick something neither of you has ever done.

Y.title: Yoga for two
Y.description: Try partner yoga with synchronized poses. Balance, trust, and connection.

Z.title: Zoo or aquarium outing
Z.description: Marvel at the animals like kids again. Each of you picks a favorite animal.
